title: Pathlock TDnR
description: Push connector for Pathlock TDnR using Data Collection Endpoint + Data Collection Rule (Logs Ingestion API).

instructionSteps.title: Deploy
instructionSteps.description: Use the button on the connector tile to create DCE + DCR and app registration.

instructionSteps.title: Configure Pathlock
instructionSteps.description: Set DCE URL, DCR ID, Stream ID, Tenant, Client ID/Secret in Pathlock.
